title: organization
description: Schema for an organizational ruleset in MDF.

canonical_name.description: The name of the organization to be displayed in the 'organization' field.

aliases.description: Other names or abbreviations that refer to the same organization.

homepage.description: The organization's website, landing page, or other informational URI.

permission_groups.description: UUIDs of Globus Groups. Members of the group(s) will be allowed to submit data to MDF Connect using this organization. Managers and higher roles (such as admins) will additionally be given permission to curate organization datasets. Non-members cannot submit data to this organization.

visible_to.description: This is a list of security principals allowed to read the metadata.

items.description: Each string will be in the form of a Principal URN, or the special string "public"

data_destinations.description: Data locations (which must be Globus endpoints) to send data for this organization.

curation.description: Whether or not curation is required for all datasets in this organization.

mint_doi.description: Whether datasets submitted to this organization mint a Digital Object Identifier

domains.description: Facility domains of the submission. e.g., materials, chemistry.

project_blocks.description: The special project blocks associated with this organization's metadata.
